1191EF5255EC4A45A8A7EB75D37BBD06.description:
use culturally appropriate learned vocabulary and
structures associated with a broad range of topics, and
structures such as simple and complex sentences to
communicate through the full range of time frames.

C91CD819DAA34B3C88B0415CA08CFE27.description:
write multiparagraphed essays, journals, personal and
business letters, and creative texts in which their
thoughts are unified and presented in an organized
fashion; errors in form may occur, particularly when the
students are writing about complex themes or issues
requiring the expression of opinions, or when the topic is
outside their realm of experiences

31266F3CFAFC4004977E4FC7D834D758.description:
draw on a broad range of learned vocabulary, idioms,
and structures, including the full range of time frames,
as well as language acquired through independent
reading

B4A94EE88D754965A4BBC2C791099287.description:
comprehend the content of most texts of interest to

native speakers

CFA24A0304C74068942AD3A283A5FB1D.description:
Reading and writing are used in languages other
than English for the purposes of socializing, providing
and acquiring information, expressing personal
feelings and opinions, and getting others to adopt a
course of action.

DB40704000B840B39334D70567F409F9.description:
engage in extended discussions with native or fluent
speakers on a broad range of topics that extend beyond
their daily lives and are of general interest to the target
cultures.

A3123D102A854FD58FD3C7C3FE2A6291.description:
comprehend subtler, nuanced details of meaning with
some repetition and rephrasing

C4F47DD8313044248B60803C128C6C5C.description:
draw on a wide range of language forms, vocabulary,
idioms, and structures learned in class as well as those
acquired through independent exposure to the language

4CD0C7BA6391404BA0E6063D4E8E4845.description:
understand the main ideas and significant relevant
details of extended discussions or presentations, and of
recorded songs, feature programs on radio and
television, movies, and other media designed for use by
native speakers.

8132B1A3D797486DAFADDBB208EFCB04.description:
understand standard speech delivered in most authentic
settings

CB14A68DCF094F369304C024B0A005AA.description:
Listening and speaking are primary communicative
goals in modern language learning. These skills are
used for the purposes of socializing, providing and
acquiring information, expressing personal feelings
and opinions, and getting others to adopt a course of
action.

E2355D4912714B82A86E8B154CD1CBD6.description:
produce written narratives and expressions of opinion

about radio and television programs, newspaper and

magazine articles, and selected stories, songs, and

literature of the target language.

064CC845542E4840973B8B0C4189E49E.description:
write brief analyses of more complex content when given
the opportunity for organization and advance
preparation, though errors may occur more frequently

B8709B94ADD94AA4A3C4546E715EB3C8.description:
write short notes, uncomplicated personal and business
letters, brief journals, and short reports

521EC4F2C9FE428D9173A135F5BF76DD.description:
read simple materials independently, but may have to

guess at meanings of longer or more complex material

BC40B8E4373742DA83652A811793419C.description:
use cognates and contextual and visual cues to derive

meaning from texts that contain unfamiliar words,

expressions, and structures

1C1735ABFFC442F7A88D0F8785A97591.description:
read and comprehend materials written for native

speakers when the topic and language are familiar.

5939D334F8D94CD2B3A8280CF3190E24.description:
Reading and writing are used in languages other
than English for the purposes of socializing, providing
and acquiring information, expressing personal
feelings and opinions, and getting others to adopt a
course of action.

63DF1F2827044589BE198F4BF0EF5348.description:
use repetition and circumlocution as well as gestures and
other nonverbal cues to sustain conversation.

E41BA8B43C7048E18FBAB46B4799D53A.description:
exhibit spontaneity in their interactions, particularly

when the topic is familiar, but often rely on familiar

utterances

1C2EFA2866DC4ACBAB23F8B518B92072.description:
select vocabulary appropriate to a range of topics,
employ simple and complex sentences in present, past,
and future time frames, and express details and nuances
by using appropriate modifiers

8944B66FF8BC47659055CBCDDF394765.description:
initiate and sustain conversations, face to face or on the
phone, with native-speaking or more fluent individuals

C15B0EB0B33444FF8CEBFFADBDB44FBA.description:
understand the main idea and some discrete information
in television, radio, or live presentations

9252A4EB8FB6479DA7DB968466A7ADBC.description:
comprehend messages and short conversations when
listening to peers, familiar adults, and providers of public
services ei

FD98DBEEFE184954B19F9AC4462D39FE.description:
Listening and speaking are primary communicative
goals in modern language learning. These skills are
used for the purposes of socializing, providing and
acquiring information, expressing personal feelings
and opinions, and getting others to adopt a course of
action.

1FC85099F5E04AC99928FCED84A5B283.description:
compose short, informal notes and messages to exchange
information with members of the target culture.

078E372B0C934E53B925DA7A6B30EDED.description:
understand the main idea and some details of simple

informative materials written for native speakers

3CE6B3E304C248FAAB11481F65C48803.description:
Reading and writing are used in languages other
than English for the purposes of socializing, providing
and acquiring information, expressing personal feelings
and opinions, and getting others to adopt a
course of action.

EC7BB06C66544B619EC2445D52FE485B.description:
use appropriate strategies to initiate and engage in simple
conversations with more fluent or native speakers of the
same age group, familiar adults, and providers of common
public services.

9C0A907C763B4C8E9F571348B14CBCD5.description:
call upon repetition, rephrasing, and nonverbal cues to
derive or convey meaning from a language other than
English

83B0461C2A024581A536FAB933C97E7D.description:
comprehend the main idea of more extended

conversations with some unfamiliar vocabulary a

189F8D666C4B4CD7B0B9BA57E5C999A2.description:
comprehend language consisting of simple vocabulary

and structures in face

AD676F09A0AF4FC3AB57AB2E08DE54C7.description:
Listening and speaking are primary communicative
goals in modern language learning. These skills are
used for the purposes of socializing, providing and
acquiring information, expressing personal feelings
and opinions, and getting others to adopt a course of
action.
